mapper.insert: INSERT INTO study(title, author, content, view_count, source, time, coverImage) VALUES (#{title}, #{author}, #{content}, #{viewCount}, #{source}, #{time}, #{coverImage})
mapper.select: SELECT ss.* FROM study ss JOIN study rs ON ss.id = rs.study WHERE rs.route_id = #{routeId} ORDER BY rs.sort_order ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE study SET title = #{title}, author = #{author}, content = #{content}, source = #{source}, time = #{time}, coverImage = #{coverImage} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE study SET view_count = view_count + 1 WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM study ORDER BY view_count DESC LIMIT #{limit}
